title: Video Shows Students Protesting in Indonesia, Not Kashmir!
subtitle: Fact Check of kashmir Protest Video: The video is actually from Jakarta in Indonesia and not Kashmir. It shows police clashing with the protestors as students took to streets demonstrating against a new law.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The video is actually from Jakarta in Indonesia and not Kashmir. It shows police clashing with the protestors as students took to streets demonstrating against a new law which they say has crippled the country’s anti-corruption agency. According to a report in The Guardian, clashes between protestors and the police broke out on Monday evening when the latter tried to disperse the crowd which was attempting to reach the Parliament.

We need used the keywords ‘Teargas protest students Indonesia’ on YouTube and came across multiple videos uploaded by news outlets. In one of the videos uploaded by ‘Bloomberg Tic Toc’, we could match the visuals used in the viral video.

Also, the viral video has a logo which reads ‘BBC News Kashmir’. But firstly, there is no vertical of BBC by this name and secondly, ‘Kashmir’ has added to BBC’s logo as the font is clearly not the same.
